title: Computer affecting my cast time?
body:
Hi guys, 
I'm opening this discussion because i have a small query regarding my computer and its effects on my gameplay. I'm an Irelia main, played close to 1000 solo queue games last season and one issue that i've noticed when playing on my desktop over these games  is the amount of time it takes for me to cast my q. I only have 34 ping generally and the reason why i know it's slow is because at an internet cafe i go to, where i have 32 ping, the cast time on my abilities is infinitely smoother and more responsive than what i experience at home. Does this 2 ping make all the difference or is it my computer, and if it is the latter, what component of my computer is causing this to be the case?

replies.body: Could it be your keyboard? I have a corsair k70 and it has a few features to deal with key stroke speed and ghosting im pre sure.. Unless you're using a tv screen instead of a computer screen? Because i know tv screens are like 2 seconds or less behind normal response for a pc

could it be a faulty key? ..


or maybe like the majority of players on this game- could it be Riot's fault? Think about it friend
The two ping would not be the issue, it'd be other factors. I can play on both 49 and 200.

I play on 100 - 200 average ping with a wifi hotspot, it's probably the last resort before hooking up internet through a bunch of koalas but it works.

Sounds like you might be further away from a node where you live.
FPS issue more than Ping. Computer at Lan Cafe is better than the one you have at home.
